sentences.en: Gravity is inversely proportional to the square of the distance.
sentences.cn: 重力与距离的平方成反比.

sentences.en: Law of demand: price and quantity demanded are negative ( inversely ) related.
sentences.cn: 需求定律: 需求量 一般与价格成反方向变动.

sentences.en: Pressure varies directly with temperature and inversely with volume.
sentences.cn: 压力随温度成正比例变化,与容积成反比例变化.

sentences.en: The amount of force needed is inversely proportional to the rigidity of the material.
sentences.cn: 需要的力度与材料的硬度成反比.

sentences.en: The availability of good medical care tends to vary inversely with the need for it.
sentences.cn: 优质医疗服务的提供往往与需要成反比.

sentences.en: The energy supply from carbohydrate and fat is inversely related.
sentences.cn: 这两种能源的供应是逆转换的关系.

sentences.en: The insulation resistance of a cable is inversely proportional to its length.
sentences.cn: 电缆的绝缘电阻与其长度成反比.

sentences.en: The magnitude of the rebound inversely related to ribavirin concentrations.
sentences.cn: 反跳的程度与利巴韦林浓度呈负相关.

sentences.en: The overvoltage varies inversely with the current density to some extent.
sentences.cn: 超电压在某种程度上随电流密度成反比地变化.

sentences.en: The probability of survival is inversely proportional to the angle of arrival.
sentences.cn: 生存的机会跟着陆角度呈反比.

sentences.en: The rate of reannealing is inversely proportion to sequence complexity.
sentences.cn: 再退火速度是和顺序复杂性成反比例.

sentences.en: The rate of the fertilizer - N was inversely correlated with its utilization rate.
sentences.cn: 肥料氮的损失率与利用率成反相关.

sentences.en: The size of the nebula at this stage is inversely proportional to its mass.
sentences.cn: 这个阶段星云的大小与其质量成反比。

sentences.en: The value of a fraction is inversely proportional to that of the denominator.
sentences.cn: 分数值与分母值成反比例.

sentences.en: The velocity of the fluid is inversely proportional to the spacing of the streamlines.
sentences.cn: 流体的流速与流线的间距成反比.

sentences.en: We regard health as inversely related to social class.
sentences.cn: 我们认为健康状况与社会地位成相反关系。

words.tran_cn: 换流器，[电子] 反相器；倒转者
颠倒（invert的过去分词）；使…反向

trans.tran_en: opposite in amount or position to sth else
